textBox.richText: SHUT UP SHUT UP SHUT UP SHUT UP!!!!

....if you are going to complain! So you don’t want AT&T, and hack a phone that is currently locked down due to exclusive contracts?...but complain when it gets re-locked after countless of notices by Apple? get AT&T, wait till it’s open....or get ANOTHER PHONE. Are you crying over the fact that 3rd party apps are locked out as of now with the new update? Get yourself an Open Source Phone and stop complaining. What really bothers me....is that people have become cry-freakin babies! People are suing over CRAP!. PLEASE....get a nokia and stop using a computer, you’re clogging up my news feeds
